about_the_game:
Take charge as the main provider for your family, relying on your fishing skills to put food on the table. With each cast of your line, you'll aim to reel in a variety of fish species from different fishing spots, each offering its own challenges and rewards.

Your primary objective is simple: catch fish to exchange for essential groceries and supplies. Navigate through various fishing locations, ranging from serene lakes to bustling rivers, and even venture out into the vast ocean. Your success depends on your ability to master different fishing techniques and adapt to the changing conditions of each fishing spot.

As you progress, you'll encounter a diverse range of fish species, each requiring a different approach to catch. Experiment with different baits, lures, and fishing gear to maximize your haul. With careful planning and strategic decision-making, you'll be able to trade your catch for the items your family needs to survive.

"Fishing for a Living" offers a realistic simulation of the daily challenges faced by fishermen. From the tranquility of the water to the excitement of reeling in a big catch, experience the highs and lows of life on the water as you strive to make a living from the fruits of your labor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Step into the shoes of the family's breadwinner, mastering the art of fishing, and exchange your catch for essential groceries. Strategically navigate challenges to ensure the well-being of your loved ones is fully met.
